Kempinski Nile Hotel, Cairo.description:
Located in Cairo’s affluent Garden City district, Kempinski Nile Hotel offers luxurious rooms on the shores of the Nile River. It features a wellness centre and a rooftop swimming pool.

Each of Kempinski’s rooms offer free WiFi, high definition LCD TVs with satellite channels and free Coca Cola drinks from the mini bar. For guests’ comfort, we offer the butler service, concierge and pillow menu.

A 10-minute walk from the Nile River embankment, Safir hotel in Cairo’s city centre offers luxurious rooms with balconies. It features an outdoor pool, gym and free Wi-Fi in public areas.

Each air-conditioned room is spacious and includes a work desk, satellite TV and minibar. The private bathrooms come with a bathtub and hairdryer, and some rooms have a seating area.

Guests can relax in Safir’s sauna and hot tub at the hotel’s spa area, where massage treatments are also available. The outdoor pool invites for a refreshing dive or a sunbath on the poolside loungers.

Each room is fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and guests can enjoy complimentary soft drinks from the minibar. Certain units include a seating area. All rooms include a private bathroom featuring bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries.

You also enjoy the wide selection of fitness, spa and swimming facilities. The hotel has 23 function rooms with a business centre and pre-function foyer. It also has a 3 ballrooms. Inspired by the concept of the garden in heaven, Devarana is an authentic Thai spa that excites the senses and makes guests feel truly special. Luxurious pampering and healing treatments are offered in a soothing and stress-relieving environment.

Guests can enjoy an array of fine dining options spanning a world of tastes and flavors from multi Asian to Turkish to Egyptian as well as an International all day dining restaurant. Guest can enjoy an all day brunch at The Bake Bar while intricate gourmet delicacies are served 24/7 at the lobby lounge and terrace.

The hotel is situated in close proximity to Cairo international Airport while main site seeing attractions are easily accessible through the highways surrounding the hotel.

Boasting one of the best views of the Great Pyramids, the Brothers Pyramids View Hotel is in Cairo (Giza) across from the Great Pyramids and the Sphinx. The Brothers Pyramids View Hotel is in a traditional area of Cairo (Giza) that is up-and-coming and being revitalized, just like the New Grand Egyptian Museum, a short drive up the street. The hotel is situated on the fourth and seventh floors of a new building and offers a variety of rooms from standard to Luxury with a view, for individuals and your family. To best help you recognise the building, we have added a photo of the building in your Room Photo Gallery. Among the Hotel's facilities are a restaurant for breakfast and drinks, offsite food service, a 24-hour front desk and Free WiFi.

The Brothers Pyramids View Hotel's roof terrace has a grand view of the three Great Pyramids. The roof terrace restaurant is open for breakfast from 8:30am to 10am. It is open for drinks and offsite food service all day until 12am.

Continental and vegetarian breakfast options are available every morning.

At the hotel, all the rooms come with air conditioning, comfortable chairs, coffee and tea in the room, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries. Hair dryers by request. At the Brothers Pyramids View Hotel, rooms come with 100% cotton bed linen and towels.

The Giza Pyramids and Sphinx are 1.7 km (5 min) from the hotel. The Grand Egyptian Museum is 6.1km (11 min) from the Hotel. The Cairo Tower is 11 km from the property. The nearest airport is Sphinx International, 29 km from Brothers Pyramids view, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Boasting an ATM, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. The accommodation offers a shared kitchen, room service and currency exchange for guests.

At the hotel rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Jasmine Pyramids Hotel each room is fitted with bed linen and towels.

Breakfast is available each morning, and includes buffet, continental and Full English/Irish options.

Speaking Arabic, English and Spanish at the reception, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area.

Great Sphinx is 2.1 km from the accommodation, while Cairo Tower is 14 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cairo International, 30 km from Jasmine Pyramids Hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Fairmont Nile City.address: Corniche El Nile, Ramlet Beaulac, Cairo, Egypt
Fairmont Nile City.description:
Located in the Nile City Towers by the River Nile, this 5-star hotel features a rooftop pool deck with spectacular views across Cairo to the Pyramids. It offers 7 food and beverage venues.

All of the Fairmont Nile City rooms are soundproof and decorated with elegant Art Deco furnishings. They come equipped with a work desk and interactive IPTV. The bathrooms have rain showers with sliding shutters. Some rooms offer a panoramic Nile view or city view.

Fairmont Nile City provides modern equipment at its spacious fitness centre. There is also a well equipped business centre on site.

Guests can enjoy gourmet dining at the Asian Fusion Saigon Restaurant and Lounge as well as Italian favorites at L’Uliveto. Guests can also enjoy Al fresco dining on the panoramic rooftop terrace. Bab El Nil offers night-time entertainment and Middle Eastern cuisine.

Fairmont Nile City is located just 23.5 km from Cairo Int’l Airport and Cairo Museum is within 10 minutes drive away. Nile Towers Mall is footsteps away from the hotel.

Grand Nile Tower.address: Corniche El Nile, Garden City, Cairo, Egypt
Grand Nile Tower.description:
Luxurious rooms and suites offer views across the River Nile at Grand Nile Tower. The wellness centre also overlooks the Nile and the hotel features 8 restaurants and an outdoor pool.

The elegantly decorated rooms and suites at Grand Nile Tower come with a work desk, satellite TV and minibar. Each offers a modern bathroom stocked with amenities and a hairdryer.

Guests can enjoy views of the Nile from the revolving restaurant, which serves International dishes. Japanese, Indian and Italian cuisine are also available, and live entertainment is organised regularly on the hotel’s private yacht.

Guests can work out in the gym or enjoy a warm hot-tub session. It is also possible to relax on the waterfront terrace or to visit the hotel’s Galleria shopping and entertainment centre. The property offers a supervised kid's club offering activities for children.

Cairo International Airport is 20 km from the property. The Egyptian Museum is a 15-minute walk away.

This recently renovated apartment is located 2.3 km from The Egyptian Museum and 2 km from Tahrir Square. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a picnic area.

The units provide views of the lake and come with a seating area, a washing machine, a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave, and a private bathroom with bathrobes and slippers. A balcony with an outdoor dining area and river views is offered in each unit. At the apartment complex, every unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

A selection of options including warm dishes, local specialities and fresh pastries is available for breakfast, and breakfast in the room is also available. There is a coffee shop on-site.

Sightseeing tours are available in the surrounding area. A car rental service is available at the apartment.

Rooms at The Australian Hostel have air conditioning, a tea/coffee maker and a private or shared bathroom. Some rooms have a balcony.

Guests can enjoy an Egyptian or continental breakfast in the mornings. The Australian’s communal kitchen allows guests to cook their own meals.

The oriental-style communal room equipped with comfortable couches and a coffee table is a nice place to meet other travelers or read a book.

The Australian Hostel's staff can help arrange tours of Cairo city centre, local museums and the Pyramids. They also provide maps and sightseeing brochures.

The Australian is a 15-minute walk from the Railway Station.

Pyramids Gem Plaza Hotel & Apartments.description:
Situated in Cairo, 1.2 km from Giza Pyramids and Great Sphinx, Pyramids Gem Plaza Hotel & Apartments features accommodation with free WiFi, air conditioning, a shared lounge and a terrace.

Each room features amenities such as air conditioning, high-quality mattresses and pillows, satellite TV, coffee and tea facilities, a mini bar, and WIFI. These quiet rooms provide a peaceful oasis for travelers. Additionally, some of our units are equipped with a full kitchen, a washing machine, and even a dishwasher, making them ideal for families of 4 to 8 people.

Start your day with a delightful breakfast experience at our rooftop, where you can enjoy a continental, American, or vegetarian breakfast while taking in the magnificent view of the Great Pyramids of Giza. If you prefer, you can also visit for a drink and relaxation throughout the day.

The GEM Plaza Hotel offers a range of facilities and services to enhance your stay. Whether it's onsite or nearby, you'll find amenities to suit your needs.

Our hotel's strategic location ensures easy access to various landmarks and attractions. Cairo Tower is 13 km from Pyramids Gem Plaza Hotel & Apartments, while Mosque of Ibn Tulun is 14 km from the property. The nearest airport is Sphinx International, 33 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service. We look forward to welcoming you to Egypt and creating unforgettable memories during your stay at The GEM Plaza Hotel.

A car rental service is available at the apartment.

The Nile Ritz-Carlton, Cairo.description:
Situated in the heart of Cairo lies the iconic Nile Ritz-Carlton Cairo, situated between the Nile river, Tahrir square and adjacent to the Egyptian Museum. The hotel features panoramic views of the Nile corniche and only a stroll across to Qasr El Nil Bridge and Cairo Opera House. Guests can enjoy the free WiFi in the public areas as well as in the room.

Spacious and stylish, the rooms offer working desks. All rooms come with a TV. You will find a coffee machine in the room. Each room is fitted with a private bathroom that comprises a lavish bath tub and a walk-in shower. For your comfort, you will find bath robes, slippers and a hair dryer.

The hotel offers a Casino and night life experience. More than nine distinctive restaurants and bars promise an unforgettable getaway. Bab El-Sharq is the signature Arabian restaurant offering Shisha and daily entertainment, Vivo the Italian restaurant overlooks the Nile and Cairo tower and Nox offers a nightlife experience from the rooftop overlooking entire Cairo.

The hotel also offers 24/7 fitness center, a lavish spa and a year-round sunny outdoor pool.

Khan El Khalili Bazaar is 1 km away from The Nile Ritz-Carlton, Cairo, while The Cairo Tower is 1.3 km away. The nearest airport is Cairo Airport, 25 km from the property.

All accommodations at Marriott Mena House, Cairo have air conditioning and include luxurious fabrics, a seating area and LCD TV. Each room and suite has a spacious private bathroom with a bathrobe and slippers.

Breakfast is available in the dining room facing the garden.

Dining choices range from Italian specialties at Alfredo Restaurant, while Daily Buffet Breakfast and unforgettable vistas with its cocktails served at 139 Pavilion.

Recreational Facilities include a winter heated swimming pool tucked away in the landscape gardens.

The Giza Pyramids are less than half a kilometer from the Marriott Mena House. The concierge can arrange horse and camel rides to the pyramids. Cairo Airport is 30.6 km away.

Holiday Inn City stars offers free WiFi in public areas. Magic Galaxy, Egypt's largest indoor theme park and downtown Cairo are both a 24-minute drive away.

The spacious rooms of Holiday Inn Citystars feature flat-screen TV with satellite channels and tea/coffee makers. Rooms on the upper floors offer panoramic views over Cairo.

The Holiday Inn’s restaurants serve a variety of cuisines. From the rooftop garden to the Star Corner Café in the lobby. Open 24-hours, Windows Restaurant tempts hungry diners with heaped international buffets and live cooking stations. Indira Restaurant serves an authentic Indian culinary experience.

After a day of shopping at Citystars, guests can relax in the outdoor heated pool. There is also a state-of-the-art fitness centre. Holiday Inn Citystars is a 10 minutes from Cairo International Conference Centre. On-site car parking is available.

At the hotel, each room is equipped with a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom equipped with free toiletries, while certain rooms at Pyramids Valley also provide guests with a terrace. Guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge.

The aparthotel provides guests with a terrace, sea views, a seating area, satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, and a private bathroom with bidet and slippers. The Westin Cairo Golf Resort & Spa, Kata.description:

Guests can enjoy snacks in the pool bar that surrounds the outdoor heated pool and avail the free WiFi throughout the hotel and in the rooms.

The 135 rooms and 19 suites overlook the luscious gardens, pool or golf course. All rooms at the Westin Cairo are air conditioned and offer a relaxing seating area with a satellite flat-screen TV. Every room is fitted with a private bathroom equipped with a Heavenly® Shower/Bath.

Guests at the Westin Cairo can relax at the Heavenly®spa centre and sauna, or work out a seat in the state of the art fitness centre.

The Westin Cairo resort offers a varied F&B experience with Paloma the all-day dining restaurant designed with a deep inspiration of nature and its beauty, serving Mediterranean cuisine. The pool bar serves drinks and light snacks around the pool deck area.

Guests who would like history and culture can enjoy the Pyramids and the Sphinx who are only 42 km away. The nearest airport is Cairo International Airport, 29 km from the property.

Located in the ancient village of Abu Sir, Sakkara Inn Hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, a garden and a roof top terrace overlooking the pyramids. Horse riding courses are available upon request.

The rooms overlook the garden. Each rooms offer air conditioning, a wardrobe and ensuite bathrooms.

Sakkara Inn Hotel is a 45-minute drive from Cairo International Airport. The tour desk arranges excursions upon request. Free public parking is possible on site.

Arabia Hotel.description:
Located on Roda Nile Island in the heart of Cairo, Arabia Hotel offers spacious accommodation. Most rooms offer views of the Nile and some are equipped with a balcony.

The air-conditioned rooms feature wooden furniture and have private bathrooms with a tub. All rooms come with a fridge and some rooms offer a kitchenette. A TV is also provided for in-room entertainment.

Arabia’s restaurant serves a specialty goat meat dish. Guests can enjoy fresh fish and pizzas, while admiring views of the Nile. The restaurant also provides room service.

Free Wi-Fi is available in the hotel’s coffee shop, which is located in a quiet courtyard away. It offers a range of drinks and shisha waterpipes.

On-site parking at Arabia is free. Malek El-Saleh Metro Station is a 15-minute walk from the hotel, and a 3-stop ride to central Tahrir Square. Cairo International Airport is 25 km away.

Conrad Cairo Hotel & Casino.description:
Conrad Cairo is situated in the heart of bustling downtown overlooking the magnificent River Nile. Nearby the Egyptian Museum and 5 minutes walk from Nile City shopping mall. Conrad Cairo features spectacular views of the River Nile, enjoy access to the city center businesses as well as legendary attractions, 30 minutes to the Great Giza Pyramids and the Sphinx by car.

This 5-star luxury hotel offers city explores premium rooms with a private balcony featuring views of the Nile River, comfortable sitting area and a work desk. All rooms have a flat-screen TV with movie channels, a DVD player, marble bathroom comes with a separate bath tub, walk-in shower, signature fragrance amenities and a fluffy bathrobe, slippers and a hair dryer, Guests can enjoy the free WiFi in all rooms, public areas and meeting rooms. Facilities include a heated outdoor pool, Room Service is available around the clock, a glamorous international casino and bar is available 24/7, and a health club with modern fitness equipment, 24-hour gym, sauna, steam, massage rooms, and on-site shops.

The hotel offers 6 restaurants and bars round the clock dining and entertainment; Savor the modern Italian cuisine at Oak Restaurant. Experience Pan Asian flavors at Kamala Asian Bar & Dining, sample the extensive breakfast buffet or choose from the delectable à la carte menu for lunch at Solana Restaurant or enjoy Egyptian Lebanese cuisine t Jayda Nile Terrace, serving in a stunning outdoor setting. Unwind in the glitz and glamour of Stage One Lounge & Bar and soak up the multi-cultural vibes of Cairo.

This Landmark boosts 11 flexible meeting and banquet rooms including one of the city’s largest ballrooms. Khan El Khalily Bazaar is 30 minutes drive away from the hotel, while Cairo Tower is 10 minutes. Cairo International Airport is 16 miles away.

Lotus Hotel Cairo.description:
Built in 1950, our art deco hotel in the heart of Cairo still provides a warm, family welcome and an outstanding location from which to explore this fascinating city.

Located on one of the quarter's main thoroughfares - the famous Soliman Pasha Street (today Talaat Harb Street) - our hotel maintains an authentic belle époque ambience full of history and nostalgia.

Today, this sense of past is complimented by the modern conveniences which we offer; internet access, currency exchange and an airport shuttle service are a few examples of our dedicated hospitality.

We also have business facilities for those of you with important meetings to attend. The restaurant and bar will be open into the evening; come and dine, relax and share stories in our sophisticated hotel with lots of fascinating tales of its own.

For guests with children, the guest house offers a baby safety gate. If you would like to discover the area, cycling, hiking and walking tours are possible in the surroundings and Museum View Inn can arrange a car rental service.

Mosque of Ibn Tulun is 16 km from the accommodation, while Tahrir Square is 17 km from the property. The nearest airport is Sphinx International, 30 km from Museum View Inn, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

\u0634\u0642\u0629 \u0645\u0641\u0631\u0.address: عباس العقاد, Nasr City, 11765 Cairo, Egypt
\u0634\u0642\u0629 \u0645\u0641\u0631\u0.description:
Located in Cairo, شقة مفروشة للايجار علي عباس العقاد الرئيسي provides accommodation with private pool, free WiFi and free private parking for guests who drive. Conveniently set in the Nasr City district, this apartment offers a garden, as well as a sauna and a hot tub. City Stars is 3.9 km from the apartment and Cairo Intl Conference Centre is 5 km away.

Leading onto a terrace with garden views, the spacious air-conditioned apartment consists of 3 bedrooms. The unit at the property features a hot tub and a dressing room.

A bar can be found on-site, and you can make use of the kitchen facilities.

Guests can enjoy the indoor pool at the apartment.

Al-Azhar Mosque is 11 km from شقة مفروشة للايجار علي عباس العقاد الرئيسي, while El Hussien Mosque is 11 km away. The nearest airport is Cairo International Airport, 9 km from the accommodation.

Bella Casa.address: 2 Al Bostan Al Sidi Passage, 11613 Cairo, Egypt
Bella Casa.description:
Bella Casa, a property with a shared lounge, is situated in Cairo, 600 metres from Tahrir Square, 700 metres from The Egyptian Museum, as well as 2.2 km from Cairo Tower. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment features city views, a picnic area, a 24-hour front desk, and free WiFi is available throughout the property.

At the apartment complex, units come with a wardrobe. All units are fitted with air conditioning, and some have a flat-screen TV, washing machine, a kettle, completed with a fully equipped kitchen. At the apartment complex, each unit includes bed linen and towels.

For guests with children, the apartment provides a baby safety gate. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at Bella Casa.

Al-Azhar Mosque is 2.7 km from the accommodation, while El Hussien Mosque is 3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cairo International, 16 km from Bella Casa, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Salma Hotel Cairo.address: 12 Mohamed Kamel Morsy, Mohanessin, Dokki, Cairo, Egypt
Salma Hotel Cairo.description:
Located in Cairo in the Al Mohandessin district, Salma Hotel is only a 6-minute drive from the Cairo Opera House. It has a spacious rooftop terrace and offers air-conditioned guestrooms.

Salma rooms have simple wooden furnishings and private bathrooms. They come equipped with a minibar and a TV. All rooms have free Wi-Fi.

In the morning the hotel serves a breakfast with hot tea and coffee. The hotel has a café and a restaurant that provides room service and offers international cuisine made from fresh ingredients.

The Salma Hotel is one kilometre from Al Zamalek Stadium. The hotel offers 24-hour front desk service and luggage storage.
room_type: Standard Double Or Twin- Egyptians And Resident's only

Cozy Apartment in Maadi ring road with s.address: Al Harmeen street- compound Tabark -new Maadi  In front of BMW showroom, 11714 Cairo, Egypt
Cozy Apartment in Maadi ring road with s.description:
Featuring air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony, Cozy Apartment in Maadi ring road with smart TV is located in Cairo. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and full-day security, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The apartment also offers facilities for disabled guests.

The spacious apartment is equipped with 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with an oven, a microwave, a washing machine, a fridge and a stovetop. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

For those times when you'd rather not dine out, you can choose to have groceries delivered.

The apartment complex has a picnic area where you can spend a day out in the open.

Cairo Citadel is 13 km from the apartment, while Mosque of Mohamed Ali Pasha is 13 km away. The nearest airport is Cairo International, 22 km from Cozy Apartment in Maadi ring road with smart TV, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Cosy flat.description:
Set in Cairo, 7.8 km from Cairo Intl Conference Centre and 10 km from Cairo Citadel, Cosy flat offers spacious air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. This apartment also features a private pool. There is private parking and the property features an electric vehicle charging station.

The apartment is composed of 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is featured. The accommodation is non-smoking.

City Stars is 12 km from the apartment, while Al-Azhar Mosque is 12 km away. The nearest airport is Cairo International Airport, 17 km from Cosy flat.

Ismailia House Inn.description:
300 metres from Tahrir Square, Ismailia House Inn is situated in Cairo and provides free WiFi, express check-in and check-out and a tour desk. Boasting room service, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The accommodation features a shared kitchen, a shared lounge and currency exchange for guests.

Speaking Arabic and English at the 24-hour front desk, staff are ready to help around the clock.

The Egyptian Museum is 800 metres from the inn, while Cairo Tower is 1.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cairo International Airport, 17 km from Ismailia House Inn.

A cozy studio at central Cairo..description:
Boasting accommodation with a balcony, A cozy studio at central Cairo. Is situated in Cairo. The property is around 2.4 km from Al-Azhar Mosque, 2.4 km from Tahrir Square and 2.6 km from El Hussien Mosque. Cairo Tower is 3.9 km away and Mosque of Mohamed Ali Pasha is 4.5 km from the apartment.

With free WiFi, this 1-bedroom apartment features a cable flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and fridge. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

The Egyptian Museum is 3.6 km from the apartment, while Mosque of Ibn Tulun is 3.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cairo International Airport, 15 km from A cozy studio at central Cairo..

\u0634\u0642\u0647 \u0645\u0641\u0631\u0.description:
Set in Cairo, 4.4 km from The Egyptian Museum and 4.7 km from Cairo Tower, شقه مفروشه المهندسين بانوراما على جامعة الدول العربية الرئيسي offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The property is around 4.9 km from Tahrir Square, 7.5 km from Al-Azhar Mosque and 7.9 km from El Hussien Mosque. Mosque of Ibn Tulun is 8.3 km from the apartment and Mosque of Mohamed Ali Pasha is 9.2 km away.

The spacious apartment has a terrace, 4 bedrooms, a living room and a well-equipped kitchen. A flat-screen TV is offered.

Cairo Citadel is 11 km from the apartment, while Cairo Intl Conference Centre is 14 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cairo International Airport, 21 km from شقه مفروشه المهندسين بانوراما على جامعة الدول العربية الرئيسي.

Blue Eyes Hotel.description:
Blue Eyes Hotel is set in Cairo, within 1.7 km of Cairo Tower and 2.3 km of Tahrir Square. This 3-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Staff on site can arrange a shuttle service.

Rooms are complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower, all guest rooms at the hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms also offer a balcony.

The Egyptian Museum is 2.4 km from Blue Eyes Hotel, while Al-Azhar Mosque is 4.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cairo International Airport, 19 km from the accommodation.
